actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a credit against income tax to individuals for tuition expenses incurred in providing private nonprofit elementary and secondary education.

summary.text: Allows a tax credit under the Internal Revenue Code for 50 percent of tuition expenses incurred in providing private nonprofit elementary and secondary education up to a mazimum of $500 per year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a credit against income tax to individuals for tuition expenses incurred in providing private nonprofit elementary and secondary education.
